system.description: Through extensive augmentation, your body has begun to transcend flesh, taking on the qualities of blessed machinery.
system.benefit: Character gains one level of the Machine Trait. Character can be healed with the Tech-Use Skill in place of Medicae, however such tests suffer an additional -20. Talent can be taken up to three times, gaining one level of the Machine Trait each time.
system.notes: Can be taken up to 3 times, each time granting +1 level of Machine trait

specialAbilities.name: Machine (X)
specialAbilities.description: You gain one level of the Machine trait. Each time this talent is taken, you gain an additional level (maximum 3).

specialAbilities.name: Tech-Use Healing
specialAbilities.description: You can be healed with the Tech-Use skill in place of Medicae, however such tests suffer an additional -20 penalty.
